step_data.thought: I'm already in the Cart Price Rules section which is part of the Marketing/Promotions area. To create a new promotional campaign, I need to click the 'Add New Rule' button that has bid '696'. This will take me to the page where I can configure a new promotional campaign/cart price rule.
